verses.verse: וַיֹּ֥סֶף <WH3254> also proceeded אֱלִיה֗וּא <WH453> Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

כַּתַּר־ <WH3803> Suffer לִ֣י זְ֭עֵיר <WH2191> me a little וַאֲחַוֶּ֑ךָּ <WH2331> and I will shew כִּ֤י <WH3588> there ע֖וֹד <WH5750> is yet לֶאֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> on God's מִלִּֽים׃ <WH4405> thee that [I have] yet to speak
אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> I will fetch דֵ֭עִי <WH1843> my knowledge לְמֵרָח֑וֹק <WH7350> from afar וּ֝לְפֹעֲלִ֗י <WH6466> to my Maker אֶֽתֵּֽן־ <WH5414> and will ascribe צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH6664> righteousness

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אָ֭מְנָם <WH551> For truly לֹא־ <WH3808> are not שֶׁ֣קֶר <WH8267> [shall] not [be] false מִלָּ֑י <WH4405> my words תְּמִ֖ים <WH8549> he that is perfect דֵּע֣וֹת <WH1844> in knowledge עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold אֵ֣ל <WH410> Behold God כַּ֭בִּיר <WH3524> [is] mighty וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִמְאָ֑ס <WH3988> and despiseth כַּ֝בִּ֗יר <WH3524> not [any he is] mighty כֹּ֣חַֽ <WH3581> in strength לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> [and] wisdom
לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יְחַיֶּ֥ה <WH2421> He preserveth not the life רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked וּמִשְׁפַּ֖ט <WH4941> right עֲנִיִּ֣ים <WH6041> to the poor יִתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> but giveth

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִגְרַ֥ע <WH1639> He withdraweth מִצַּדִּ֗יק <WH6662> from the righteous עֵ֫ינָ֥יו <WH5869> not his eyes וְאֶת־ <WH854> with מְלָכִ֥ים <WH4428> but with kings לַכִּסֵּ֑א <WH3678> [are they] on the throne וַיֹּשִׁיבֵ֥ם <WH3427> yea he doth establish לָ֝נֶ֗צַח <WH5331> them for ever וַיִּגְבָּֽהוּ׃ <WH1361> and they are exalted
וְאִם־ <WH518> and if אֲסוּרִ֥ים <WH631> And if [they be] bound בַּזִּקִּ֑ים <WH2131> in fetters יִ֝לָּכְד֗וּן <WH3920> [and] be holden בְּחַבְלֵי־ <WH2256> in cords עֹֽנִי׃ <WH6040> of affliction

וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> Then he sheweth לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> to them פָּעֳלָ֑ם <WH6467> them their work וּ֝פִשְׁעֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6588> and their transgressions כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יִתְגַּבָּֽרוּ׃ <WH1396> that they have exceeded

וַיִּ֣גֶל <WH1540> He openeth אָ֭זְנָם <WH241> also their ear לַמּוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> to discipline וַ֝יֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and commandeth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְשֻׁב֥וּן <WH7725> that they return מֵאָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> from iniquity

אִֽם־ <WH518> If יִשְׁמְע֗וּ <WH8085> If they obey וְֽיַ֫עֲבֹ֥דוּ <WH5647> and serve יְכַלּ֣וּ <WH3615> [him] they shall spend יְמֵיהֶ֣ם <WH3117> their days בַּטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> in prosperity וּ֝שְׁנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH8141> and their years בַּנְּעִימִֽים׃ <WH5273> in pleasures

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִ֭שְׁמְעוּ <WH8085> But if they obey בְּשֶׁ֣לַח <WH7973> by the sword יַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <WH5674> not they shall perish וְ֝יִגְוְע֗וּ <WH1478> and they shall die כִּבְלִי־ <WH1097> without דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> without knowledge

וְֽחַנְפֵי־ <WH2611> But the hypocrites לֵ֭ב <WH3820> in heart יָשִׂ֣ימוּ <WH7760> heap up אָ֑ף <WH639> wrath לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְ֝שַׁוְּע֗וּ <WH7768> they cry כִּ֣י <WH3588> when אֲסָרָֽם׃ <WH631> not when he bindeth
תָּמֹ֣ת <WH4191> die בַּנֹּ֣עַר <WH5290> in youth נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> They וְ֝חַיָּתָ֗ם <WH2416> and their life בַּקְּדֵשִֽׁים׃ <WH6945> [is] among the unclean
יְחַלֵּ֣ץ <WH2502> He delivereth עָנִ֣י <WH6041> the poor בְעָנְי֑וֹ <WH6040> in his affliction וְיִ֖גֶל <WH1540> and openeth בַּלַּ֣חַץ <WH3906> in oppression אָזְנָֽם׃ <WH241> their ears

וְאַ֤ף <WH637> indeed הֲסִיתְךָ֨ ׀ <WH5496> Even so would he have removed מִפִּי־ <WH6310> the mouth צָ֗ר <WH6862> of distress רַ֭חַב <WH7338> [into] a broad place לֹא־ <WH3808> no מוּצָ֣ק <WH4164> [there is] no straitness תַּחְתֶּ֑יהָ <WH8478> where וְנַ֥חַת <WH5183> and that which should be set שֻׁ֝לְחָנְךָ֗ <WH7979> on thy table מָ֣לֵא <WH4390> [should be] full דָֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1880> of fatness
וְדִין־ <WH1779> the judgment רָשָׁ֥ע <WH7563> of the wicked מָלֵ֑אתָ <WH4390> But thou hast fulfilled דִּ֖ין <WH1779> judgment וּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> and justice יִתְמֹֽכוּ׃ <WH8551> take hold

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that חֵ֭מָה <WH2534> Because [there is] wrath פֶּן־ <WH6435> does not יְסִֽיתְךָ֣ <WH5496> [beware] lest he take thee away בְסָ֑פֶק <WH5607> with [his] stroke וְרָב־ <WH7227> in abundance כֹּ֝֗פֶר <WH3724> ransom אַל־ <WH408> nay יַטֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH5186> cannot deliver
הֲיַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <WH6186> Will he esteem שׁ֭וּעֲךָ <WH7769> cry לֹ֣א <WH3808> not בְצָ֑ר <WH1222> gold וְ֝כֹ֗ל <WH3605> all מַאֲמַצֵּי־ <WH3981> nor all the forces כֹֽחַ׃ <WH3581> of strength
אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁאַ֥ף <WH7602> Desire הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> not the night לַעֲל֖וֹת <WH5927> are cut off עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> when people תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <WH8478> their place

הִ֭שָּׁמֶר <WH8104> Take heed אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֣פֶן <WH6437> regard אֶל־ <WH413> to אָ֑וֶן <WH205> not iniquity כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and זֶ֝֗ה <WH2088> this בָּחַ֥רְתָּ <WH977> for this hast thou chosen מֵעֹֽנִי׃ <WH6040> rather than affliction
הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold אֵ֭ל <WH410> Behold God יַשְׂגִּ֣יב <WH7682> exalteth בְּכֹח֑וֹ <WH3581> by his power מִ֖י <WH4310> Who כָמֹ֣הוּ <WH3644> like מוֹרֶֽה׃ <WH3384> who teacheth

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who פָקַ֣ד <WH6485> Who hath enjoined עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> and who אָ֝מַ֗ר <WH559> has said פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <WH6466> Thou hast wrought עַוְלָֽה׃ <WH5766> iniquity
זְ֭כֹר <WH2142> Remember כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תַשְׂגִּ֣יא <WH7679> that thou magnify פָעֳל֑וֹ <WH6467> his work אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> of which שֹׁרְר֣וּ <WH7891> behold אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH376> men
כָּל־ <WH3605> All אָדָ֥ם <WH120> Every man חָֽזוּ־ <WH2372> may see ב֑וֹ אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <WH582> it man יַבִּ֥יט <WH5027> may behold מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <WH7350> [it] afar off

הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold אֵ֣ל <WH410> Behold God שַׂ֭גִּיא <WH7689> [is] great וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not נֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> and we know מִסְפַּ֖ר <WH4557> [him] not neither can the number שָׁנָ֣יו <WH8141> of his years וְלֹא־ <WH3808> be searched חֵֽקֶר׃ <WH2714> be searched out

כִּ֭י <WH3588> for יְגָרַ֣ע <WH1639> For he maketh small נִטְפֵי־ <WH5198> the drops מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water יָזֹ֖קּוּ <WH2212> they pour down מָטָ֣ר <WH4306> rain לְאֵדֽוֹ׃ <WH108> according to the vapour
אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> Which יִזְּל֥וּ <WH5140> do drop שְׁחָקִ֑ים <WH7834> Which the clouds יִ֝רְעֲפ֗וּ <WH7491> [and] distil עֲלֵ֤י ׀ <WH5921> upon אָדָ֬ם <WH120> upon man רָֽב׃ <WH7227> abundantly

אַ֣ף <WH637> yet אִם־ <WH518> lo יָ֭בִין <WH995> Also can [any] understand מִפְרְשֵׂי־ <WH4666> the spreadings עָ֑ב <WH5645> of the clouds תְּ֝שֻׁא֗וֹת <WH8663> [or] the noise סֻכָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH5521> booth

הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold פָּרַ֣שׂ <WH6566> Behold he spreadeth עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> about אוֹר֑וֹ <WH216> his light וְשָׁרְשֵׁ֖י <WH8328> the bottom הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> of the sea כִּסָּֽה׃ <WH3680> upon it and covereth
כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֭ם יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> For by them judgeth עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> he the people יִֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> he giveth אֹ֥כֶל <WH400> meat לְמַכְבִּֽיר׃ <WH4342> in abundance

עַל־ <WH5921> and כַּפַּ֥יִם <WH3709> With clouds כִּסָּה־ <WH3680> he covereth א֑וֹר <WH216> the light וַיְצַ֖ו <WH6680> and commandeth עָלֶ֣יהָ <WH5921> and בְמַפְגִּֽיעַ׃ <WH6293> it [not to shine] by [the cloud] that cometh betwixt

יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> thereof sheweth עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> his presence רֵע֑וֹ <WH7452> The noise מִ֝קְנֶ֗ה <WH4735> concerning it the cattle אַ֣ף <WH637> also עַל־ <WH5921> concerning עוֹלֶֽה׃ <WH5927> also concerning the vapour
